external_references.description: InGuardians. (2022, January 5). Peirates GitHub. Retrieved February 8, 2022.

description: [Peirates](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0683) can dump the contents of AWS S3 buckets. It can also retrieve service account tokens from kOps buckets in Google Cloud Storage or S3.(Citation: Peirates GitHub)
